dishes.name: Enchiladas
dishes.description: Homemade verde or Enchilada sauce covered in melted cheese and topped with sour cream

dishes.name: Cochinita Burrito
dishes.description: Cochinita, rice, black beans, pickled red onions, and radish habanero salsa

dishes.name: Vegan Taco
dishes.description: Rice, black beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and guacamole

dishes.name: Falafel Wrap
dishes.description: Hummus, falafel, caramelized onions, roasted red peppers, grilled eggplant, parsley, and salad greens with tahini sauce on a warm pita. Served with a side of pickles and green Skhoog hot sauce. Vegan. Vegetarian. Gluten free upon request.

dishes.name: Gorg Salad
dishes.description: Gorgonzola crumbles, caramelized walnuts, raisins, red onion, red peppers, shredded beet and carrot on mesclun greens with house balsamic vinaigrette. Vegetarian. Gluten-free.

dishes.name: Redonkadonk
dishes.description: An OMG burger with two grilled cheese sandwiches instead of a bun.

dishes.name: Black & Bleu
dishes.description: Bacon, sausage, bleu cheese, grilled onions, fried egg & blackening spice.

dishes.name: Crispy Fried Buttermilk-battered Chicken
dishes.description: w/ tasso ham gravy, mashed potatoes & collards

dishes.name: Backyard Burger
dishes.description: 10 oz. of cascade natural ground sirloin w/ cheddar, savory tomato jam, lettuce, onion, & side of fries

dishes.name: Pasta Primavera
dishes.description: Spaghetti pasta with garden fresh asparagus, zucchini, carrots, sweet peas, crimini mushrooms, broccoli, grape tomatoes & finished with sweet cream.

dishes.name: Linguine Carbonara
dishes.description: Pasta tossed with pancetta (Italian bacon), onions, egg, cream, parmigiano reggiano & pecorino romano cheeses.
